https://ca.linkedin.com/in/john-friesen.headline: 😎 Software Developer | 🌟 API Architect | 🚀 DevOps Enthusiast | 💻 Golang, C# | ☁️ Cloud Software Engineer, Google Cloud Platform, Azure, Kubernetes, Serverless
https://ca.linkedin.com/in/john-friesen.summary:
👋🏻 Hi, I'm a cloud software developer with 7+ years of experience in software engineering, API development, cloud engineering, and DevOps. I'm experienced in creating scalable, reliable, and secure applications that can handle any challenge.

👨‍💻 My skills include:

- 🖥️ Programming languages: C#, Golang, Java
- ☁️ Cloud platforms: Google Cloud Platform (GCP), Azure
- 💾 Cloud services: serverless, Kubernetes, data storage solutions
- 🤖 DevOps practices: CI/CD pipelines, cost reduction, key stakeholders engagement
- 🏗️ Architecture design: scalability, performance, reliability, security
- 📈 Project planning and execution
- 🔍 System analysis and improvement
- 🔙 Backend software development
- 🚀 Launching and maintaining APIs

🔍 Some of my notable achievements include:

- 🌟 Launched my own API (if you are curious ask me about it :D)
- 📊 Developed a product trend history database
- 💰 Reduced cloud hosting costs by 30% by optimizing server sizing and reducing alert fatigue
- 🧑‍🏫 Mentored junior developers on software development best practices and helped them improve their skills
- 🗄️ Spearheaded a 50+ TB data migration project from on-premises servers to GCP using pubsub and Kubernetes
- 💻 Brought DevOps practices to several companies, resulting in improved collaboration and faster time-to-market

☕ Interested in chatting or having a virtual coffee? Let's connect!

experiences.title: Senior Software Developer
experiences.description:
In this role i was also Head of DevOps, I led the development and maintenance of distributed systems that collect data, ingestion, full-text search, and storage, enabling clients to analyze and query large volumes of unstructured data from various sources. Additionally, I was responsible for managing technical interactions with vendors or cloud service providers.

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
🔹Spearheaded a data migration project from on-premises servers to GCP, which involved moving 50+ TB of unstructured data. Utilized pubsub to receive the data from on-premises servers and created an ingestion Kubernetes deployment for injecting data into our GKE Elasticsearch cluster
🔹Managed hundreds of on-premises using Ansible, SSH, and Linux for optimal performance and reliability. Hosting in-house Java applications, Elasticsearch, Cassandra, and ActiveMQ for data storage and search functionality
🔹Participated in software-related hiring interviews to ensure that new hires had the necessary skills and experience to support our distributed systems
🔹Conducted cost analysis and planning for reducing hosting costs by more than 30% with server optimization/downsizing and cloud product usage

experiences.title: Senior Azure Cloud Engineer
experiences.description:
While on the Presto Client project at Accenture, I leveraged my expertise in Azure Cloud technologies and services to provide guidance on monitoring critical transportation payment processing systems. My role involved leading the team's effort on developing integrations between monitoring services and working with multiple development teams to gather monitoring requirements and help them find the best ways to monitor their applications using Azure's full suite of monitoring offerings.

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
🔹 Rearchitected integration projects resulting in reliable near real-time processing that saved roughly 50% on cloud hosting costs
🔹 Collaborated with multiple teams to devise optimal monitoring solutions for their cloud deployments which reduced alert fatigue and turnaround time for operations teams
🔹 Designed secure monitoring data pipelines by introducing SSL-secured traffic between cloud and on-premises monitoring products using Azure IAM service accounts and firewall rules
🔹Introduced software development best practices including implementing Azure DevOps for CI/CD, Git repository usage for code management, and task management across the team

experiences.title: Intermediate Full-stack Developer
experiences.description:
As an Intermediate Full-Stack Developer at IMC Business Architecture, I worked primarily with C# and JavaScript while leveraging my expertise in Azure Cloud services. My role involved developing and deploying software for clients by building customized features on top of their existing CMS systems hosted on the Azure platform. This included working closely with clients in meetings to understand their needs and requirements so that I could provide expert solutions tailored to their specific business goals. 

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
🔹Mentored junior developers on best practices for coding, project management, and communication skills leading to their professional growth
🔹Collaborated with design teams to create user-friendly interfaces for client software systems resulting in improved customer satisfaction
🔹Ensured timely and quality completion of software development projects with cross-functional teams
🔹Provided hands-on training on the optimal use of Git to employees in the company

experiences.title: Intermediate Software Developer
experiences.description:
Part of a team creating a product to provide the Automotive industry (AIAG) with proper data centralization and source control system related to vehicle parts and processes.
Ensured effective collaborations between customers and application developers to design bespoke digital products by assigning work tasks, establishing priorities, and coordinating with team members. Actively contributed to the architecture of large-scale IT systems development projects.

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
🔹Decreased dev cloud costs by 25% through maximizing the adoption of cloud resources throughout the organization and effective coding practices/architecture design
🔹Initiated DevOps practices to streamline the full software development life cycle and drive optimum efficiency
🔹Recruited, supervised, and mentored co-op students, evaluated team performance, assessed training needs, and conducted training sessions to improve productivity
🔹Provided projection of unexpected cloud costs that opposed product pricing model by conducting project analysis

experiences.title: Computer programmer Analyst
experiences.description:
Overseen remote developers while establishing daily targets, monitoring ongoing progress, and providing constructive feedback on staff performance. Structured web applications and APIs by utilizing advanced tools and multiple Azure cloud services. Automated reporting process by designing data models and data aggregation system.

KEY ACHIEVEMENTS:
🔹Optimized website efficiency by a minimum of 50% by performing web analysis and identifying areas of improvement
🔹Introduced and implemented a server-less architecture for multi-platform messaging service.
🔹Mentored junior developers by implementing pull requests, open communication and fostering good habits in our industry that they can take with them anywhere they go

experiences.title: Teacher’s Assistant
experiences.description:
I helped in Fanshawe's Computer Programmer Analyst program in their 3rd semester C++ class.
I helped make the professor's job an easier in the class by helping the students. Either with troubleshooting or answering their question so they have a better understanding of the course content.

experiences.title: Programmer Analyst
experiences.description:
.Net web development working on student organization applications.
Created an automated testing process using Telerik tools and custom created C# libraries for wiping and resetting of the testing database.
Integrated with Jenkins to automate the execution of the End-to-end tests.

experiences.title: .NET Developer
experiences.description: Web Developer working with Asp.net, C#, Javascript, SQL,Bootstrap and Knockout.
